channel.title: [Pi] DL
channel.description: Hey guys how do I make a downloadable client so other people can play with me? Like if I just upload my client and source to something then they cant play with me just by themselfs, can anyone help?

item.title: [Pi] DL
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

Its simple really, fix the client to make your ip, port forward, compress the client, go to www.uppit.com and send the link to ur friends.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] DL
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Redemtion, post:5, topic:414507”]Get your client linked to your ip using a no-ip or w/e you want.
Linking it means changing all the localhost ip’s (127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0) to your no ip (blabla.no-ip.biz)
Get a no-ip at www.no-ip.com
Then after thats done compile and exit that area then find the main client folder (the one u wer just in) and right click>add to compressed folder(zipped) OR add to “Client name”.rar
Then upload it to your site or mediafire or w/e u use.
And you should be done.
Hope this helps[/quote]

…
Beat you to it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] DL
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

Get your client linked to your ip using a no-ip or w/e you want.
Linking it means changing all the localhost ip’s (127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0) to your no ip (blabla.no-ip.biz)
Get a no-ip at www.no-ip.com
Then after thats done compile and exit that area then find the main client folder (the one u wer just in) and right click>send to compressed folder(zipped) OR add to “Client name”.rar
Then upload it to your site or mediafire or w/e u use.
And you should be done.
Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] DL
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

You have to Portforward first. Then, get WinRAR. Create a No-IP.com IP. Open up the .java file named ‘client’ in the client’s files. Then search for ‘server =’, you should find something like this:
server = “127.0.0.1”;

See where the 127.0.0.1 is? Change that to your no-ip.com IP.
Now with WinRAR. You have to right click your client’s files and press ‘Add to archive’, then press ‘Create .rar’ or whatever it says about a .rar file. Then upload it to any file sharing website. (I like mediafire the best :p) - Now share the link with the people you want to play, and you can all play together.

Good luck.

Read full topic
